## AudioManager.getAllLoopedAudios() method

Retrieves all looped audio instances for the world.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getAllLoopedAudios(tickAllocated?: boolean): Audio[];
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

tickAllocated


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ If true, uses the tick allocator and frees the allocated array at the end of the current tick. false by default.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[Audio](./server.audio.md)<!-- -->\[\]

An array of audio instances.
